title: StretchBack Chair
detail: A smart chair designed to promote good sitting posture and significant health benefits
extended_details: Humans spend a significant amount of their days sitting in chairs at different ages and in different settings. This can have a negative effect on one’s posture and spine positioning. Current efforts to make comfortable chairs that don’t put strain on one’s back are expensive and intricate models not designed for mass production. We propose creating a new, versatile chair model that is attractive to both students and professionals.
